title: Blog App
description: A full-stack blog application that allows users to register, log in, create, update, delete, and view blog posts. Public blogs are accessible to everyone, while private blogs remain exclusive to the owner through JWT-based authentication.

title: Fyesta Event Planners
description: A minimum viable product (MVP) for an event planning platform that provides a range of event services. Built using Next.js, TailwindCSS and deployed on Vercel with a custom domain.

title: 3D Portfolio
description: A dynamic 3D portfolio website showcasing projects, skills, and experiences using React, Three.js, and Framer Motion for interactive animations.
